summary: On a Sunday, Eileen Tyler, still a virgin, leaves Albany to visit her airline pilot brother in New York but a chance encounter with a man on a city bus threatens to derail her upcoming marriage to boyfriend Russ.
cast: Jane Fonda|Rod Taylor|Cliff Robertson|Robert Culp|Jo Morrow|Jim Backus|Peter Nero|Don Ames|Rayford Barnes|Al Beaudine|Paul Bradley|Ralph Brooks|Steve Carruthers|Sam Flint|Jim Hutton|Robert Locke Lorraine|John Marlin|Alvy Moore|Tony Regan|Teri Schwartz|Teru Shimada|Olan Soule|Tracee Towers|Robert B. Williams
title: Un domingo en Nueva York
